UPDATE exam_info
exam_code = #{examCode},
user_code = #{userCode},
exam_nm = #{examNm},
exam_type = #{examType},
exam_oe_type = #{examOeType},
exam_tar_grd = #{examTarGrd},
exam_description = #{examDescription},
exam_date = #{examDate},

WHERE exam_code = #{examCode}
mapper.select: SELECT ei.exam_code, ei.user_code, u.user_name, u.user_id, ei.exam_nm, ei.exam_type, ei.exam_oe_type, ei.exam_tar_grd, ei.exam_description, ei.exam_date, exam_inst FROM exam_info ei INNER JOIN `user` u ON ei.user_code = u.user_code WHERE u.grade_code ='ugc1' AND ei.exam_code = #{examCode} Order by CAST(SUBSTRING(ei.exam_code,3) AS UNSIGNED) DESC;

SELECT ei.exam_code, ei.user_code, u.user_name, u.user_id, ei.exam_nm, ei.exam_type, ei.exam_oe_type, ei.exam_tar_grd, ei.exam_description, ei.exam_date, exam_inst FROM exam_info ei INNER JOIN `user` u ON ei.user_code = u.user_code WHERE u.grade_code ='ugc1' Order by CAST(SUBSTRING(ei.exam_code,3) AS UNSIGNED) DESC;
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO exam_info (exam_code, user_code, exam_nm, exam_type, exam_oe_type, exam_tar_grd, exam_description, exam_date, exam_inst) VALUES (#{examCode}, #{userCode}, #{examNm}, #{examType}, #{examOeType}, #{examTarGrd}, #{examDescription}, #{examDate}, #{examInst});
mapper.update: UPDATE qna_bank SET user_code = #{userCode}, sub_mjr_cat_code = #{subMjrCatCode}, sub_mir_cat_code = #{subMirCatCode}, qna_type = #{qnaType}, qna_chap = #{qnaChap}, qna_subject = #{qnaSubject}, qna_qst = #{qnaQst}, qna_slt1 = #{qnaSlt1}, qna_slt2 = #{qnaSlt2}, qna_slt3 = #{qnaSlt3}, qna_slt4 = #{qnaSlt4}, qna_slt5 = #{qnaSlt5}, qna_ans = #{qnaAns}, qna_scr = #{qnaScr}, qna_cmt = #{qnaCmt}, qna_cur_exam_state = #{qnaCurExamState}, qna_create_time = #{qnaCreateTime}, qna_update_time = NOW() WHERE qna_code = #{qnaCode}
mapper.select: SELECT qb.qna_code, qb.user_code, smjc.sub_mjr_cat_nm, qb.sub_mjr_cat_code, smic.sub_mir_cat_nm, qb.sub_mir_cat_code, eqt.exam_qna_type_nm, qb.qna_type, eqc.exam_qna_chap_nm, qb.qna_chap, qb.qna_subject, qna_qst, qb.qna_slt1, qb.qna_slt2, qb.qna_slt3, qb.qna_slt4, qb.qna_slt5, qb.qna_ans, qb.qna_scr, qb.qna_cmt, qb.qna_cur_exam_state, qb.qna_create_time, qb.qna_update_time FROM qna_bank qb INNER JOIN sub_mjr_cat smjc ON qb.sub_mjr_cat_code = smjc.sub_mjr_cat_code INNER JOIN sub_mir_cat smic ON qb.sub_mir_cat_code = smic.sub_mir_cat_code INNER JOIN exam_qna_chap eqc ON qb.qna_chap = eqc.exam_qna_chap_code INNER JOIN exam_qna_type eqt ON qb.qna_type = eqt.exam_qna_type_code WHERE qna_code=#{qnaCode}

SELECT qb.qna_code, qb.user_code, u.user_id, u.user_name, qb.sub_mjr_cat_code, smjc.sub_mjr_cat_nm, qb.sub_mir_cat_code, smic.sub_mir_cat_nm, qb.qna_type, qna_chap, qb.qna_subject, qna_qst, qb.qna_slt1, qb.qna_slt2, qb.qna_slt3, qb.qna_slt4, qb.qna_slt5, qb.qna_ans, qb.qna_scr, qb.qna_cmt, qb.qna_cur_exam_state, qb.qna_create_time, qb.qna_update_time FROM qna_bank qb LEFT JOIN sub_mjr_cat smjc ON qb.sub_mjr_cat_code = smjc.sub_mjr_cat_code LEFT JOIN sub_mir_cat smic ON qb.sub_mir_cat_code = smic.sub_mir_cat_code LEFT JOIN user u ON qb.user_code = u.user_code ORDER BY CAST(SUBSTRING(qb.qna_code,3) AS UNSIGNED) DESC;

INSERT INTO qna_bank (qna_code, user_code, sub_mjr_cat_code, sub_mir_cat_code, qna_type, qna_chap, qna_subject, qna_qst, qna_slt1, qna_slt2, qna_slt3, qna_slt4, qna_slt5, qna_ans, qna_scr, qna_cmt, qna_cur_exam_state, qna_create_time, qna_update_time) VALUES (#{qnaCode}, #{userCode}, #{subMjrCatCode}, #{subMirCatCode}, #{qnaType}, #{qnaChap}, #{qnaSubject}, #{qnaQst}, #{qnaSlt1}, #{qnaSlt2}, #{qnaSlt3}, #{qnaSlt4}, #{qnaSlt5}, #{qnaAns}, #{qnaScr}, #{qnaCmt}, 'Y', NOW(), NULL);

SELECT eqc.exam_qna_chap_code as examQnaChapCode, eqc.user_code as userCode, eqc.sub_mjr_cat_code as subMjrCatCode, smjc.sub_mjr_cat_nm AS subMjrCatNm, eqc.sub_mir_cat_code as subMirCatCode, smic.sub_mir_cat_nm AS subMirCatNm, eqc.exam_qna_chap_nm as examQnaChapNm FROM exam_qna_chap eqc INNER JOIN sub_mir_cat smic ON eqc.sub_mir_cat_code= smic.sub_mir_cat_code INNER JOIN sub_mjr_cat smjc ON eqc.sub_mjr_cat_code= smjc.sub_mjr_cat_code ORDER BY CAST(SUBSTRING(exam_qna_chap_code,5) AS UNSIGNED);

SELECT exam_qna_type_code as examQnaTypeCode, sub_mjr_cat_code as subMjrCatCode, sub_mir_cat_code as subMirCatCode, user_code as userCode, exam_qna_type_nm as examQnaTypeNm, exam_qna_type_create_date as examQnaTypeCreateDate FROM exam_qna_type ORDER BY CAST(SUBSTRING(exam_qna_type_code,5) AS UNSIGNED)

SELECT smic.sub_mir_cat_code, smjc.sub_mjr_cat_code, smjc.sub_mjr_cat_nm, smic.sub_mir_cat_nm, smic.comm_slt, smjc.cur_exam_user_state, smic.cur_exam_user_state as subMirState FROM sub_mir_cat smic RIGHT JOIN sub_mjr_cat smjc ON smic.sub_mjr_cat_code = smjc.sub_mjr_cat_code ORDER BY CAST(SUBSTRING(smjc.sub_mjr_cat_code,7) AS UNSIGNED);
